definition: variant of 聯結|联结[lian2 jie2]
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

pinyin: ju2 bu4 lian2 jie2 wang3 luo4

sentences.english: The inclusion of any link to other websites does not imply endorsement by the Nestlé Group.
sentences.chinese: 將其他網站置於連結內不代表雀巢集團對其認可。

sentences.english: Rosin modified nonylphenol resin is used as the linking mater ial in printing-inks.
sentences.chinese: 松香改性壬基酚醛樹脂用於油墨連結料。

sentences.english: The United Ns Security Council tooksanctionscontrary to the aggressor country.
sentences.chinese: 連結國安了解對侵略國採取了制裁措施。

sentences.english: It is the tea of the earth that keep here smiles in bloom.
sentences.chinese: 是大地的淚點，使她的微笑連結着青春不謝。

sentences.english: The cylinder head is attached to the block with high-tensile steel studs.
sentences.chinese: 氣缸蓋與氣缸體用高強度的鋼螺栓縛連結。

sentences.english: To be in love is to enter a delicate relationship of mutual influence and attachment.
sentences.chinese: 二人相戀是一種彼此影響，互相連結的微妙關係。

sentences.english: Skywalk in Bangkok, Thailand, which connects three express stations in downtown.
sentences.chinese: 曼谷空中走廊，於市中心連結三個捷運站。

sentences.english: B. Connect the drainage accessory with the coupler.
sentences.chinese: 將排水配件和連結器連接起來。

sentences.english: The true dreareers are they who think things ca very go on indefinitely the way they are.
sentences.chinese: 真正的理想家是那些以爲事物會悠久連結不變的人。

sentences.english: Please link to the following web addresses for furthur details.
sentences.chinese: 詳情請登入以下相關連結網址查詢中英文公告。

sentences.english: This leads to cords of attachment rebounding into the fields of those remaining behind.
sentences.chinese: 這導致連結的繩索回彈入那些活着的人的能量場。

sentences.english: We are truly happy to exchange links with relevant sites.
sentences.chinese: 本頁爲輪播交換連結，更多的連結都在各分頁。

sentences.english: We are truly happy to exchange links with relevant sites.
sentences.chinese: 本頁爲輪播交換連結，更多的連結都在各分頁。

sentences.english: The Book URLs represent links to web-based content referenced in the textbook.
sentences.chinese: 本書的URL表示教材中引用的網上資源連結。

sentences.english: The website "Business Shark-Fin Banquet Reporting Site" is now up. Please click this link to enter.
sentences.chinese: 已經成立，請按此連結進入。
這兩個數字連結在一起。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to transmit/to pass on to sb else/(math.) transitive
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
